p.s:
prayogagatā’’dhikāracintā muktā kṛ
tsnena phalena vyāpyate phalāvayavena veti kākadantaparīkṣāprayo
gāviśeṣāt

kiṃ kṛtsnaphalārthino yāgopadeśa utā
'vayavārthano ’pītyupadeśo ’dhikāra eva cinyate sayapya
nuṣṭhānāviśeṣe

atha vā kriyāphalaṃ kartṛgāmi bhavasekasminpakṣe,
itaratrākartṛgāmi

samudāyakartṛtve karmamadhya ekasmi
npramīte nānya ānetuṃ labhyate

evaṃ cet saptadaśa prājāpatyānityatra yathā pūrva
pakṣe ekasmin paśau vinaṣṭe kṛtsnaḥ paśugaṇa prāvartate evam ihā
pyekasminnaṣṭa saptadaśa bhūtvā punarādāvārabhya yāgamanutiṣṭhanti

kutaḥ phalaṃ prāpnuyādyadyekaikaḥ pṛthak pṛthak prayogaḥ
syāt

api ca yatkarma bahupu pha
leṣu tadekatra prayoga ekam eva phalaṃ sādhayati

kimuta yadekaphala
maṃtra coditam ? kiṃ ca ṛddhikāmā isekaśeṣo ’yam

tatra yadī
taretayuktāḥ phalaṃ kāmayante tata ekaśeṣa upapadyate

yadyapyasmin pade ’vivakṣitastathā’’pi yādṛśānāṃ sādhanabhāvo ’va
gatastādṛśānām eva phalasambandhaḥ

itaretarayuktāś ca phalasādhanatve
nāvagatāstata itaretarayuktā eva phalena sambhantsyante

yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasyetyanena nyāyenaikai
kasya phalaṃ prārthayamānasya satramupāyo vidhīyate; na satraṃ prati te
vidhīyante

yadi
caikaikaḥ kartā tato bahutvātkartṛṇāṃ bahuvacanamupapadyate

atha kartṛtve śrutaṃ dravyeṣu kalpyeta, tato ’yam eva doṣo ya
danyatra śrutamanyatra kalpitam

sāmādibhiḥ prayokṣyata iti phalaṃ
prārthayataḥ satramupāyo vidhīyate

tac ca vahukartṛkaṃ phalasādhane sa
marthaṃ tava mayā saha bhavatā yaṣṭavyaṃ nānyeneyasmin viṣaye sāmā
dayo ’vataranti

yadyekaikasya kartṛtvamitare saṅkhyāpūraṇārthāḥ
syustataḥ kartṛtvābhāvādbahuvacanābhāva iti sa eva doṣaḥ

sa eva
prayoga ekaikasya tulyastatra na gamyate viśeṣa itarasya prayogo
netarasyeti

devatoddeśena dravyasya yaḥ saṅkalpaḥ sa ekaikasyā
'viśiṣṭaḥ

quote.ab:
api votpattisaṃyogādyathā syāt sattvadarśanaṃ tathā
bhāvo vibhāge syāt

p.s: ṛddhikāmā ityatrotpattivākya eva kartṛgāminī saṅkhyā śrūyate

yadi guṇavākye śrūyeta na yāge, tata ekaikasya kriyāphalena saṃ
yogo na syāt

tasminpakṣe na phalena vyāpyamānāḥ syurityu
ścāryante kiṃ tarhi, yāgo bahusaṅkhyāviśiṣṭaḥ kārya ityeva
m artham uccāryante

kiṃ prāptam, avivakṣitā, yajeta svargakāma iti sāmānā
dhikaraṇyaṃ, svargeṇa karttā vyāpyate

bhavati vyāpyamānaś ca pradhā
nabhūtastato ’sminpade ’vivakṣitā saṅkhyā

ekatra vivakṣitā
saṅkhyā netaratreti nāsti sāmānādhikaraṇyam

kiṃ ca sarvaḥ phale
nāhaṃ vyāpyeya ityevamarthaṃ yatate

evaṃ ced acoditatvādyāge kathaṃ tasya
saṅkhyā vivakṣyeta ? prayoge puruṣaśruteḥ prayoge puruṣasyā’’śrava
ṇādityarthaḥ

atha vā prayoge puruṣaśruteḥ prayoge puruṣaṃ śrāvayi
tvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdastena yāgaḥ kārya iti

yadīdṛśa upadeśo bha
vettato nirvarttakatvena vivakṣitā saṅkhyā syāt

phalena vyāpyamānasya nāntarīyakatvādyāge guṇabhāva iti,
etan nopapadyate

śrato vidhīyamāno nirvarttakaṃ kartāramapekṣate tatparicchedikāṃ ca
saṅkhyām

padārtha pūrvakatvācca
vākyārthasya yādṛśo ’rthaḥ padavelāyāmavagatastādṛśa evottareṇa pa
dena saṃbadhyate

tasmād yadyapi svargakāmapadena niyatā saṅkhyā
prāptā, tathā’’pyanayā’’pyākhyātaniyataviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā
sāmānādhikaraṇyamupapadyate

na cānyayuktena kriyamāṇo
yāgaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati yadā vivakṣitā syādākhyātasaṅkhyā

yatra sakṛduccarite dve vivakṣitāvivakṣi
tatve bhavastava vākyabheda, iha tu bhinnapadopādānādvivakṣā’’vi
vakṣādoṣo nāsti

yad uktaṃ na yāgaḥ karttavya upadiśyate yāgena vā ka
rttavyam iti, ucyate

yāgena kuryyād iti yadi nopadiśyeta tataḥ sādhyasā
dhanasambandhābhāvātphalaṃ na syāt

ato yajeteti yā saṅkhyā pratīyate sā guṇabhā
vāṃśena vivakṣitesetannānukte nyāye syāt

uktaś ca nyāyo, vyā
pyamānagatā saṅkhyā’’vivakṣitā

quote.ab:
api vā kāmasaṃyoge sambandhātprayogāyopadiśyeta
pratyartha hi vidhiśrutirviṣāṇāvat

p.s:
yā trapade vivakṣā sā na śāstrātkiṃ
tarhyarthāt

tatra yadi dve vivakṣite
syātāṃ tato ’rthāntaratvāddoṣo bhavet

tasmād yaḥ svargaṃ prārthaya
māna ātmasambandhitayā ātmana icchati tasya yāgo ’bhyupāya
ityarthādavagamyate

kālopagrahanimittādi
viśiṣṭā tatra saṅkhyā guṇabhūtasya puruṣasya paricchedikā ye
nāṃśena vyāpyate tenāṃśenāvivakṣitā

yadi svargakāmaśabdaḥ parasyā’’tmano vā yaḥ svarga kāma
yate tavāviśeṣeṇa vartate evaṃ cetparasyā’’pi svargamicchatya
jeteti

tasmād yo na karttā
tasya kriyāphalaṃ nāsti

jvalanapacanaprakāśanādīnyādhāturanādhātuś ca tulyā
nīti na tatphalaṃ niyantuṃ śakyam
vigatāyām api phalecchāyāṃ samāpanīyam eva karma

tatra yathā kāme ’nuṣṭhātavyaṃ tathā
sugate kāme ārambhasya vidyamānatvānnaimittikī samāptiḥ ka
rttavyā

tasmāt samāptiḥ śāstra
coditatvādvītāyām api phalecchāyāṃ kāyyāṃ

vītāyā
m api nā’’sāvabhyupāyo bhavati| abhyupeyābhāvātkathamasau kri
yate ? na vā’’rambho nimittam

kartavyopadeśaś ca śakye
ṣvartheṣu bhavatīti yāgaḥ śakyaḥ kartumityasmin narthe karttavyatāva
canasya kalpanā śakyā kartum

aśiṣṭā eva te syuryadi vi
garhayeyurvinā śāstreṇa

tataḥ śiṣṭācārātsmṛtiḥ, smṛteḥ śrutiḥ,
taittirīyāṇāṃ cānanyaparaṃ vacanamasti
tvanmatena tu pratiṣedho mama tu paryudāsa eva

kathaṃ ?
na kalaaṃ bhakṣayitavyamityupaśleṣalakṣaṇayā śrutyā bhakṣayateḥ
kartavyatāṃ tavyo vidadhāti

samāse sati paryudāso bha
vati; nāsamāse

tasmād abhakṣaṇaṃ kalaā
diviśiṣṭaṃ phalārthinā kartavyam

tava yadyayaṃ svārthavṛttaḥ sambadhyate, tato bhā
banāvaiparīsena pravartate

na ca kevalo lakṣaṇāṃ pratipattuṃ śa
kroti

tenaiva nyāyenārthabhāvanā
virodhāttasyāḥ pracyuto ’nantareṇa dhātunā sambadhyate

kriyāṃ kurvanma
thamaṃ tāvatsaṅkalpaṃ karoti, taduttarakālaṃ tasyāṃ pravarttate

rūpa
rśanādikriyā viprakṛṣṭā, mānasas tu saṅkalpo ’nantaraḥ

yathaivābrāhmaṇamāna
yeti nakāreṇa brāhmaṇajāterabhāvaḥ kriyate, puruṣajāternābhāva
ucyate

tasmād yatra puruṣatvaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇatvaṃ paryudastaṃ, sa
ānīyate, evam ihāpi nakāreṇa bhakṣaṇaṃ paryudastam

quote.ab:
śāstrāṇāṃ tvarthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate tayorasama
vāyitvāttāda vidhyatikramaḥ

p.s:
tadyadi pratiṣidhyate, pūrvamuttareṇa na saṃ
badhyate

tasmāt tatra virodhānnañpracyutaḥ prasayānantareṇa dhātunā
saṃvadhyate

dhātusambandhe hi ubhe āpa
pade lakṣaṇāvṛtte syātām

asamāse ca samāse ’py āropya pra
darśanīya ityete doṣāḥ

tathā nañpratyaya mambandhe sarvāṇi svārtha
tāni

codanāyāṃ
phalāśruteriti dve sūtre asminnūhena neye

surā na peyā,
brāhmaṇo na hantavya ityevamādayo jātamātreṇa na karttavyāḥ

ekādaśe
tu kathaṃbhāvaḥ sarvairaṅgainirākāṅgīkriyate utaikaṃkenāpīti sarvai
riti siddhānta ekādaśe sthita idamārabhyate

agnihotraṃ juho
tītyevamutpannasya viparivarttamānasya nimitte phale ca vidhānānna
tāvatkarmāntaramidam

tam eva bhedamāśriya bhāṣya
kāras tv āha dvitīye śravaṇa iti

na tu nitye tādṛśo'sti sarvadā yaḥ sarvāṅgānyupa
saṃhartuṃ śaknoti

atha vā yathā kāmye dhātoḥ pūrvāparībhūtabhāvanākaraṇatā
sarvairaṅgairnirākāṅkṣīkriyate, tathā niye ’pītyatastathābhūtopadeśāt

atha vā yathā kāmyasya sannidhāvitikartavyatā tathā ni
tyasyā’’pi sannidhānāviśeṣādityatastathābhūtopadeśāt

quote.ab:
api vā’’pyekadeśe syāt pradhāne ’py arthanirvṛttirguṇamā
tramitarattadarthatvāt

p.s:
nanu bhāvanāvacanasya kimityākāṅkṣotpannā ? na nimittena
pūryate na yāgena

yadi phalārthī
karmaṇi pravartteta, tasya yājjīvamiyetadaṅgatvena syāt

phale cānarthī
na pravarteteyayaṃ ca doṣaḥ

vyapadeśabhedaś ca na syā
nniyakāmyayoḥ phale sati

athocyeta dvāvaṃśau prayojakau pha
lāṃśo nimittāṃśaś ca

ato na virodho bhinnaviṣayatvād eva ca nimittaprayu
ktamavaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ karma

tasminkriyamāṇe phalaṃ kim iti na
kāmayata iti

yaḥ svarge na kāmayate vandhātma
katvānmokṣārthī, tasya karmasvarūpa eva karttavyatānimittasambhavāt

na ca sakṛcchrarutasya kaṃ citmati prayojakatā kaṃ citmatya
prayojakatā nyāyyā

atho
cyeta kriyāyāḥ kartavyatopadeśātkarmaṇaḥ svasāmarthyāc ca phalo
spādakatā

kathaṃ ? jyotiṣṭomadarśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sa
kṛtprayoge sarvaphalaprāptiḥ syāt

tasmād yāsu
kriyāphalaṃ pratyakṣato ’vagamyate tāḥ phalavatyo nāśrutaphalā
vaidikyaḥ

karttavyatāvacanaḥ puruṣārthenā’’vinābhūta iti cet ? prayājādā
nām api puruṣārthatvādanaṅgatā syāt

kathame
kadeśaśabda iti cet ? sāṅgasya vācakaḥ kṛtsnaśabdaḥ pradhāna
mātrāpekṣayaikadeśaśabdaḥ

atha vā dṛṣṭārthā yā puroḍāśanivṛtti
stāmapekṣyaikadeśaśabdaḥ

kathaṃ tadṛśe puruṣapravṛttiḥ prasavāyānu
tpattyarthā ? vihitākaraṇāddhi pratyavāyaḥ smaryyate

yathā loke
upānaddhāraṇādikā kriyā kaṇṭakaparihārārthī, evam ihā’’pi
pratyavāyaparihārārthā

kathamasau kriyāphalaṃ
syāt ? āgāminī pratyavāyānutpattiḥ phalam iti yadyucyeta,
tanna

tasmāt prayavāyānutpattiḥ phalam iti naivaṃ
parā codanā

kathaṃ tahi prasavāyo bhavati ? kriyāyā śrakaraṇā
t

akaraṇanivṛttiś ca karaṇaṃ, sa
kriyādharmaḥ kathaṃ phalaṃ syāt ? na ca pratyavāyābhāvaḥ phalamityu
ktam eva

yadi cāmavāyaḥ phalaṃ syāt phalanimittayorekatrā’’bhā
vādidoṣa ukta iti kecidevaṃ varṇayanti

yadi
cāsminyāgena pūryate paśukāmādiṣvapi tatra sādhanatvena
sa bhaviṣyati

a
satyapi tasminkimityākāṅkṣotpatteryāgenaiva paripūraṇānna phalā
ntaram

phalanimittayorvirodha iti cet ? avirodhaḥ bhinnavācya
svāt
nimittaṃ hi karma prayuṅke, na kāmārthatāṃ vyāvartayati

na
hi karmaṇā nimittaṃ janyate, yena phalotpattirna syāt

tasminni
mitte karmaṇi kriyamāṇaṃ prayojanam iti sutarāṃ phalābhimukhaṃ bhavati
phalaṃ na kāmāyata iti cet ? ucyate

na hīdṛśaḥ puruṣoṃ
'sti yo ’vaśyakarttavye phalaṃ na kāmayate

tasmān ni
tyāni karmāṇi tasyopāyatvena codyamānānītikarttavyatāmape
kṣante
vītāyāṃ ca phalecchāyāṃ karmaṇa idam eva phalam

tataḥ sarvatrāviśiṣṭaḥ śru
tyanugraha iti sarvatra kasmānna bhavati ? phalapadānarthakyaprasa
ṅgāt tu na bhaviṣyati

yadi
ca kriyā svaśaktyā svato ’nyatkiñcidutpādayati tatastadeva
vedenocyate

na hyaśakanīyaṃ sa utpādyatvena codayati jyoti
ṣṭomasya sakṛtprayoge sarvaphalaprāptiriti

yadi ca phalaṃ nāsti, karaṇavibhaktītaretarayogātmanepa
dānāmabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ

bhinne juhotīti nirākāṅkṣatvātkratusa
mbandho na syāt

ākāṅkṣottarakālaṃ hi kratvarthatā puruṣā
rthatā vā

bhinne juhotī sanenaiva tulyaṃ yathaitatkratuṃ pratyupādīyate
nimittaṃ ca, evam idam api

yathā ca tvatpakṣe piṇḍapitṛyajña
evamidam api

bhāṣyakāraś ca phalamicchati pradhānādidamanya
tphalamekadeśāṅgayuktātmavānātphalaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti vadan,
tathā piṇḍapitṛyajñe putrakāmeṣṭyāṃ ca sūtrakāro nisa itika
rttavyatāmicchati prayājavad iti dṛṣṭāntopādānātsiddhavadaṅgatvaṃ
darśayati

yadi ca dhātvarthaḥ karaṇatāṃ jahyātmayājādīnā
maṅgatvaṃ na syāt

karmabhūtatvānnaitadapekṣate, kiṃ mayā karttavya
m iti

anapekṣamāṇaś ca kathamitikarttavyatayā sambadhyeta ? yadi ca
yatra phalapadamasti tatraiva dhātvarthaḥ karaṇabhūtaḥ utpattivākye dhā
tvarthasya karmabhūtatvāt

svargasya ca prayogavākye karmatvena sa
mbandho nāsti
tasmād yatra yatra vidhāyakastatra tatra karaṇatā

vyapadeśaś ca karttavyatvādavaśyakarttavyatvādevaṃ ca
sāṅgaṃ yāvajjīvaṃ na śaknoti kaścidapi kartum iti kṛtvā yā
vacchaknuyādityupanivadhyate

setikarttavyatā ke tu naimittike nimitte sa
āte vaiguṇyāttatparihārāya homākhyamaṅgamupajāyate

tatki
yata evāsayāṃ bhedena upajāte vaiguṇyaṃ nāsti

quote.ab:
api vā vyatirekādrūpaśabdāvibhāgāc ca gotvavadaika
karmyaṃ syānnāmadheyaṃ ca sattvavat

p.s:
darśapūrṇamāsau yathā kālāntaradeśāntarapuruṣāntareṣu kri
yamāṇau nātiricyete, na nyūnau bhavataḥ, evaṃ dravyāntare ’pi

na dravyāntare ’pi tāveva darśapūrṇamāsāviyasya prayayasya pra
yakṣāvagatasya bādho ’sti

na
hi nīvāraiḥ kriyamāṇasya śabdāntarādibhedo bhavati

yathā naiva caitrīprayogā
dvaiśākhī prayogo bhidyate
tasyaiva sāmānyaṃ phale codyata iti cet ? tad ayuktam

kiṃ tarhi
ḍāgneyādayo vyaktiviśeṣā utpannāḥ phale vidhīyante

niyamaphala sampattī hi ya
thāśrutādbhavataḥ ? stasmāddūrutābhāve tadantotsargaḥ

āgneyo ’ṣṭākapāla itīyaṃ codanā nīvārairapi sampā
dayituṃ śakyate

prārabdhamavaśyaṃ sampādanīyam iti niyamo
ssyā eva codyate

yā ca niyamenārthāt dravyamākāṅkṣati saha
śrutairekavākyatāṃ pratipadyamānā’’rthamā vādhate

śrutābhāve
yā prāptiḥ sā kena nivāryate ? tasmād āgamaḥ karttavyaḥ

kathaṃ ? utpattivākye yadrūpamavagataṃ tadūpametra prayo
gavākyenārūpeṇa phale vidhīyate

nīvāraiḥ kriyamāṇe utpa
ttivākye yadrapaṃ tanna bhidyate

yatra guṇā co
danā bhavati vākyāntareṇa vā guṇastatra tadabhāva utpattico
danāsampattyarthaṃ dravyamupādīyate

some tu yasminnetra kṣaṇe pratyayena parāmarśo yā
gasya, dravyasyāpi tasminn eva
na hi susadṛśe sati īṣatsadṛśaḥ pakṣe ’pi prāptaḥ
tasmād aprāpto vidhīyamāno na niyamārtho bhavatīti

atha yaduktaṃ, so
makaluṣitasyotpannatvācchuddhasya pratyayavyāpāra eva nāsti, tatra
kutaḥ padāntarāpekṣā ? ucyate

padārthapūrvakatvādvākyarthasyā
napekṣayā vinā sambandha eva nāsti

anyadidānīmetadekasya
pūrvakālaḥ parāmarśaḥ ekasya samakāla iti ekasya pūrvakālena
sambandha ekasya samakāleneti na kaścidviśeṣo ’pekṣābhāvāda
sti

api ca somo naiva yāgasādhanaṃ; kiṃ tu tadupalakṣito
rasaḥ

evaṃ ca
daśame vakṣyati, paśvākṛtyupalakṣitaṃ hṛdayādi haviriti

athocyeta somākṛtyupalakṣito yo rasaḥ yāgasādhanaṃ na
pūtīkākṛtikaḥ

darśapūrṇamāsayorapi śakyaṃ vadituṃ vrīhyākṛtyu
palakṣitamavadānaṃ yāgasādhanaṃ, na tu nīvārākṛtyeti na vaiṣamyam

yanna kadācidapi mā
proti sa vidhiḥ
kaṃthaṃ ? somarasagrahaṇe tā yāgasambandhinyo na sākṣāt

dravyāśrito
yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa taddravyābhāve na bhavati

na ca pūtikāḥ soma
ityanenāṃśena gṛhyante

utpattivākya
śiṣṭena pratinidhimanicchato ’bhāve vidhānaṃ pratinidhiniyamaś ca na
syāt karmāntaraṃ tathā prasajyeta
artho vācikayā śrutyocyamāno devatātvaṃ pratipadyate nānyathā

tadvācakasyābhāve ca kathamartho devatā syāt ? nīvāraistaṇḍula
nirvṛttiḥ pratyakṣā na devatātvam

kiṃ ca sadṛśaṃ prati vidhātavyaṃ
devatā’’bhāvaś ca śabdanāśaḥ

ato devatāśabdaṃ smṛtvottara
kālaṃ syādupādānaṃ, tat tu mukhyenaiva siddham

arthena smṛtena na mukhyena, na
sadṛśena prayojanamasti
na ca śabdena smaraṇaṃ kartavyam iti

kiṃ tahi annānasāmarthyādupadraṣṭādinivṛttirmantraniyamāttadabhā
vādupadraṣṭrādi kena vāryyate ? āhavanīyo yāgahomābhyāmanā
kṣiptaḥ adṛṣṭopakāritvādvacanādvidhīyate

yatprayājādibhiḥ
kriyante tadanyā kriyā kariṣyatīti nāsti pramāṇam

kimuktaṃ bhavati, pratini
dhikāraṇāsaṃyogād iti yāvat

na teṣāmaṅgatvena vi
dhānamaṅgatvaṃ ca pratiṣidhyate

yadā pratinidhīyamāno dakṣiṇādānaṃ haviḥpradānaṃ ca
karoti tadā sa eva mukhyaḥ syāt

yadā dravyapariyāgaṃ ku
tvā’’nyatra vyāpṛto bhavati taba yāni ṛtvarthāni teṣvadhvaryu
reva pratinidhitvena karttā

yāni ca brahmacaryyādīni phalagrahaṇayogyatāyāḥ
kāraṇāni tāni bahiravasthitena kriyamāṇāni ṛtorupakā
rakāṇyeva

āsīrann iti kartṛgatā’’niyamena saṅkhyā prāptā’’saptadaśā’’
isanena niyamyate

ta
trānya śrānīyamānaḥ kriyāphalena na sambadhyate

api ca devatodeśena dra
vyasāgaṃ kurvata iyaṃ saṅkhyā

ata ānīyamānaḥ svā
migatāṃ kartṛgatāṃ saktṛgatāṃ ca saṅkhyāmasamarthaḥ pūrayitum

yathāśrutameva
tavā’’nīyamānaḥ svāmigatāṃ saṅkhyāṃ na pūrayati

yas tu mriyate,
tasya padārthe kartṛtvaṃ śaknoti pratipattum iti
etasmiś ca sthita uttare ’dhikaraṇe yo vicāraḥ sa naiva

sayapi phale? mūlasya prāpya
bhāvāditarasya karmakaratvādapi nāsti phalasambandhaḥ

tatra kiṃ
sādṛśyopādānena ? athocyeta, vrīhicodanānugrahārthaṃ sādṛśyo
pādānam

vrīhicodanāyāṃ phalārthinaḥ pravartāmahe; na
tasyāḥ svarūpānugrahārthaṃ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ nīvārāstatphalaṃ sādhayantī
ti

phalārthinā yathāśrutaṃ prakrāntaṃ, tatra
vrīhyabhāve phalābhāvāttadantotsarge prāpte vacanātprārabhya yaje
taiveti samāptirvidhīyate

tatra vrīhyākṛtiryāgasya sādhanaṃ dravyaṃ paricchindayaṅgatāṃ prati
padyate yathā, evaṃ tadgatā viśeṣā dīrghaśūkatvādayastānapi paricchi
natti

tatra yadyapi nīvārākṛtirvṛttiścānyā, tathā’’pyanye
bahavo dharmāḥ samānāḥ
sa ca guṇastasya yanmanasi viparivartate tatsādhayati

sa cā’’nāśrito na śaknoti sādhayitum iti prakrāntaṃ
karmā’’śrayati

keṣu citsaṃskāreṣu kṛteṣvanabhinirvṛtte prayojane śrutamevo
pādātavyaṃ; na saṃskārāṇāmanurodhaḥ

atha vā
vṛttepīti cet kṛte prayojane śrutamāgamayitavyam iti

atha sakalaniṣṭhā, tataḥ śiṣṭasyā
śeyatvāttata eva grahīṣyate

ato madhyapūrvārdhayorvacanena yāgārthatāyāṃ sthitāyā
miha cintā

madhyapūrvārdhāvayavopalakṣitaṃ homasādhanaṃ naṣṭe ’pi
madhyapūrvārdhāvayavini upalakṣaṇatvena vidyamānatvādava deyam

kṛtsna
sya madhyapūrvādhe iti cet ? tathā śāstrārthatvāt

yasya sarvāṇi
havīṃṣi naśyeyurduṣyeyuriti kṛtsnanāśe doṣe vā’’jyasya pratini
dhitvam

kathaṃ ? pramāṇavelāyāṃ yāva
dbhiraṅguṣṭhaparvamātrairupalakṣitaḥ sa yāgasādhanam

evaṃ cetkṛtsnamadhya
pūrvārdhe iti śāstrārtha evāyam

itarathā’’nāśe upalakṣaṇaṃ, nāśe
tūpalakṣyam iti na vairūpyamekarūpeṇa śāstreṇa bhavitavyam

yadi prayojakaḥ syādyādṛśaṃ pra
yuktaṃ tādṛśasyābhāvānna punaḥ śiṣṭādavadeyam

yat tu dravyaṃ saṃ
skāyyai tasya vidyamānatvātpunaravadānena saṃskāraḥ kim iti na
kriyate ? na cātrāvayavyupalakṣaṇārthaḥ
tasyābhāvātkaḥ pratipatti prayuñjīta ? apūrvam iti cet ? na

atastadaprayojakaṃ dravyamati
pattiścikīrṣitā na yāganirvṛttir iti

tasminyathāsamākhyaṃ kartṛṣu prāpteṣu
parisaṅkhyā kriyate, iḍāmevaite bhakṣayeyuriti

vākyapraka
raṇasamākhyābhirabhirbhakṣayitavyamityasyāpi niyamasya dṛṣṭam eva ma
yojanam

tadanuniṣpādyape
kṣyāha, taddhi bhakṣaṇaṃ puruṣasaṃskārārtham iti

kutaḥ ? tasya bhiduradravyasya para
sparasaṃgharṣaṇādavaśyambhāvī kiyānapi mātrāpanayaḥ

bhinnam iti bhidikriyopasarjanī
bhūtaṃ niṣṭhayā dravyamabhidhīyate
na bhinnam iti bhedanaṃ kadā cidbhavati

tasmād eka deśakṛtsnābhe
nnayorubhayatra bhinnabuddheḥ sambhavādubhayavā’’pi homaḥ

viśeṣaṇa evaṃ ni
mittapratyaye jāte kimarthaṃ viśeṣyaṃ yāvad gamyate ’rthād dravyaṃ lakṣyate
na śabdāt ? tasmād bhedaś ced upajāto homaś ceti

kutaḥ ? bhinna iti dravyapradhāno
nirdeśa ityuktam eva

sakalabhede
cāyogyatvāt tadarthe homaḥ sannanarthakaḥ syāt

bhinna iti sa
samī dvitīyārthe, bhinnaṃ dravyam iti

evaṃ ca vākyena homasya sa
mbandhaḥ

sannipatyopakāritāyāś ca nimittatve prakaraṇena samba
ndhaḥ

quote.ab:
syādvā prāptanimittatvānna taddharmo nityasaṃyogā
tsannihitasya guṇārthe nityatvāt

p.s:
kapālārthe home aśrutinimittakānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsāpūrva nimi
tam

bhedanaṃ ca tatra kadācit
tatropakāryasyā’’nityatvāt, prayojakasya niyatvāt

bhedanasya nimittatve bhinnena home pra
yukte ’pūrvasya tādarthyamityadoṣaḥ

yathā
jīvananimittaṃ homaṃ prayuṅke sa doṣo ’paghātārthaḥ

tatra jī
vanasya puruṣadoṣasya ca vidyamānatvādaviruddhaḥ sambandhaḥ

yathā brahmahatyādyanityaṃ nimittaṃ
puruṣadoṣaś ca tatra prāyaścittaṃ brahmahatyāprayuktaṃ doṣanirghātāya ca

ihopakārya kadā
cinna śakyaṃ nityaṃ yenopakarttum iti homo na śaknoti nitya
mupakartum

tena nityamupakuryād iti darśa
pūrṇamāsaṃ bravīti nityamupakuryād iti prayuānam

bhinnam api prayuñjānaṃ praṇāḍyā
tādarthyam eva

na ca bhinnasya prasa
kṣato doṣa upalabhyate, yena doṣanirghātārthī homaḥ syāt

sa
mbhavati hi saptamī nimitte ādhāre ca

pākṣikaṃ bāghamāha na
nityaṃ bādhamabhipretyāha-vacanādvikalpa iti cet

kiṃ cāhavanīyasyā’’nyatra kṛtārthatvādvinaspa
tvanyatrānavakāśatvāt tadupamardenaiva niveśaḥ

tatrai
kasya prakaraṇena kḷpta itarasya kalpya iti viprakarṣāt pāñca
daśyena sāptadaśyaṃ bādhyate

tadarthatve ca na śāstraṃ
niyamena kāraṇam

iha juhotiśabdaḥ, samānādhikaraṇavi
bhaktiś ca saptamī, tasmādvikalpaḥ

kiṃ ca homenā
dhārasyānapekṣitatvādvākyenāsau nīyamāno ye śuddhā homāstā
nanūdyā’’havanīya ādhāro vidhīyate, na ya ādhārakaluṣitāḥ

na kevalaṃ prāti
padikaṃ svārthe varttate

dvitīyayā tādarthye pra
tipādite saṃmārgaḥ kathaṃ viniyujyata iti, ki grahamātre utai
kasminn iti

dvi
tīyā saṃmārgasya tādarthya pratipādayantī kiṃ grahamātre pratipā
dayati utaikasya ? tasmāt tatra śeṣabhāvaḥ

kathaṃ ? yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyata itīdamadhya
trodāharaṇam

tatrāpi na vibhaktervacanamevaikaṃ prayojanam iti dvi
tvāvivakṣā

uddiśyamānasya ca viśeṣaṇamavivakṣitam iti sthitam eva ubhayapadaṃ
kiṃ nimittasannipāti, uta neti pūrvapakṣavādī manyate

yathā
''tiviṣoḥ śravaṇāttayorabhāve nāsti nimittamevamubhayapadaśra
vaṇāt tayorabhāve nāsti nimittam

atha vā yasyetyasmātsāmā
nyena buddhāvupajātāyāṃ kiṃ yasya, tata āha ubhayam iti

ki
mubhayam iti havirityukte ’nirākāṅgatvādāchatāvuccarite nimi
tapratyayo nirākāṅkṣībhavati

naimittika prayogavacano yathaiva pañcaśarāvamapekṣate ātmasi
ddhadyarthamevaṃ nimittam api

kathaṃ ? yasya
havirātimācchedityetāvati nimittapratyaye jāte naimittikena
gṛhīte ’nyasyānapekṣitvādavivakṣā

ya
dyubhayaśabdasyārddhatinā sambandho neṣyate, haviṣo ’pi mā
bhūtsambandha iti

kiyānū
padagaṇo nimittatvaṃ pratipadyata iti vivekamagṛhītvā codyate

havir ārttisambandhād ṛte
nimittapratyayābhāvo havirviśeṣaṇam iti parapakṣa ubhayathā nirā
kriyata iti havirviśeṣaṇaṃ bravīti

tathā havi
rārtisambandhanirvṛttinimittaṃ pañcaśarāvasya śaknoti hi śru
tyā, tatsambandhaṃ tu vākyena brūyāt

sā ca kāra
kairvinā nātmānaṃ pratilabhata iti kārakeṣvapi vyāpriyate
phalanimitte kriyayā sskāyate iti te prati kriyāṃ vidadhāti

yaddhaviṣo viśeṣaṇaṃ tatrāsau na tatsādhanam iti pratyayena na parā
mṛśyate

evaṃ ced ātiviśiṣṭena haviṣā nimittapratyaya upajā
yate

tatra kevalaśrutiparigrahe ni
mittavyāghāta isrārcchatinā haviṣi viśeṣyamāṇe śrutirna
hīyate

havirubhayasambandhe tu
na dhātvartho vidhīyate na so ’nyatra

tasmād ubhayapadaṃ nimittaka
rttavyatāvacanena nāpekṣitaṃ na naimittikenāto ’vivakṣitam

yathā haviḥ
śabdānnānādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ paramārthaśrutisāgena, evam ubha
yapadāmnānādyādṛśī śrutistādṛśyeva grāhyā

tasmād ārsā dve a
pītaratayukte viśeṣyete
kiyat tu gṛhītam āttinirvṛttirapi tatra gamyata iti

evaṃ cedyathaivaikena viśe
ṣyamāṇā’’pyārtinirvṛttirasti, evaṃ dvitīyenāpyāttinirvṛttira
syeva

idaṃ tāvad devānāṃ priyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ ityādinānta
nītābhiprāya idānīṃ pratipādayati

karma nimittaṃ coddiśya dhā
tvarthastava vidhīyate

ihātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ nimittaṃ tavyastam api havirā
kṛtilakṣitaṃ samastam api

tasmād yadyaddhavirākṛtikaṃ tasya tasya
nimittatā śabdena pratipādyate

yathā gaurna padā spaṣṭavya iti yo
yo gauḥ sa sa padā na spṛśyate evam ihāpi

api cobhaya
śabde haviṣā sambadhyamāne ’pi naivobhayaviśiṣṭātiḥ pratī
yeta

nanūbhayaśabdo havirviśekṣyatīyanena gatārthasya kimarthaṃ
punar upanyāsaḥ ?

yathā śuklo gaurānīyatām iti gāṃ sambadhyamānāṃ śuklo ’rthā
dviśeṣayana kṛṣṇādinivṛttiṃ karoti, evaṃ dṛṣṭāntadāśanti
kayostulyatve codite itaradavivakṣitaṃ haviṣā pūrva sambandha
mūrīkṛya nirākaroti

āītinā haviḥ parāmṛśyate; nobha
yaśabdo vidyamāno ’pi

tasmād yayā vibhaktyā ha
viruccāryamāṇaṃ sambadhyate, tenaivobhayam api sambhantsyate

yathā
ca manasi viparivarttamānayā’’ haviḥ sambadhyate evam u
bhayam api

vākyagate cobhe apyāna
rthakyādubhayaśabdasya yadyevaṃ manyase, ityupanyasya pariharati

yathā bhāryayā sa
mbadhyamāno rājānantarye ’pi na puruṣeṇa sambadhyate, nirā
kāṅkṣatvāt,evamubhayapadam

yathā śvaisaṃ paṭena sambadhyamānameka
vākyatve ’pi nāśvaviśeṣaṇaṃ tenānapekṣitatvāda, evaṃ haviṣa
āryā sambaddhatvādubhayapadasya nātinā sambandha iti

api cobha
yaśabdo ’pi haviṣā sambadhyate; na haviḥsvarūpeṇa

kiṃ tu yenā
rtterāśrayo havistasmād āryā’’nuraktena haviṣā sambadhyate

tatra prakaraṇādapūrvīyāṃśatā śakyā lakṣayituṃ
vrīhisvarūpa ānarthakyāt

evamārtyanurāge nirākṛte, athocyetārtiviśiṣṭena
haviṣobhayasya sambandha ity anena granthenānuraktena haviṣā samba
ndhaḥ kasmānnabhavatīti ? evaṃ ca pūrvadoṣadvayaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati, nā
kṛtinā sambandhaḥ śuddhena haviṣeti

itara āha— nārked iti ha
virviśeṣaṇatvenopādīyata iti

nāyaṃ havirviśeṣaṇatvanirākaraṇaparaḥ; kiṃ
tarhi, paramatābhiprāyeṇa havirna viśeṣayati

kathaṃ tū
bhayapadena haviḥ samvadhyetetyanenāṃśena viśeṣayati

atha
havirākṛtilakṣitena sambaddhamubhayamityadhyāhāraḥ asminpakṣe
havirviśeṣaṇamubhayaṃ viśeṣyaṃ taduttarakālaṃ haviranuktamubha
yamāītinā sambadhyate

pradhānabhūta ākhyāte viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, guṇabhūte ’vivakṣitaṃ
śabdavṛttenāvidhīyamānaṃ parārthamuccāryate

yatrā
khyātārthaḥ stravidhānārthamuccāryate tatra vivakṣitaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ, yatra
paravidhānārthamuccāryyate, yathā danā juhotīti dadhisambandha
vidhānārthaṃ homa uccāryyate, tatra dvitīyapadasambandho nāsti

evam ubhayaśabdo yathā’’rddhatinā sambadhyate na
havivaśiṣṭaṃ syādityanenārtipadaṃ tantryate

sayapi padārthābhidhāne homābhiṣavayoḥ kramo na vidhīyate
srthaprāptatvāt

pratyaktvam api homo
tarakālaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ homottarakālaṃ pratyaggamanam

nanvabhiṣutyeti sākāṅgatvā
duttareṇa ktvāntena saha sambadhyate

evaṃ ced ubhayaviśiṣṭena kartrā
sambandhādbhakṣasya naikakriyākarturbhakṣaḥ
evaṃ ced abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣayantīti nāsti sambandhaḥ

tasya
yatsvapadagataṃ padāntaragataṃ vā viśeṣaṇaṃ tadavivakṣitamityuktam

iha pakṣe iha sukṛtaṃ kariṣyāmīsa
nidrayadarśanātsiddhāntagrantho ’yam

āhavanīyasya laukikatvādyathā brāhmaṇavasantādivadbhāve
nātmalābhaḥ, evaṃ gārhapatyena sahotpattyā’’tmalābho na kevalasya

atha sahotpādyate itarasya ca tyāgaḥ avidya
māna utpādyate

kiṃ cāvidyamāna sahotpattyā ssèr
nīyotpattiḥ śāstrādavagatā; netarathā

dravyavināśe dravyamabhilaṣataḥ prakṛtasyaudanaḥ pañcaśarā
vaparimito dravyaṃ vidhīyate

evaṃ codanasyānantaryya lakṣaṇayā
śrutyā nyāyyaiva kartavyatā

tasmād abhāvena yallakṣyate
tatsādhayannekavākyatāṃ darśe nayati

na darśa pratiṣi
dhya pañcaśarāvo vidhīyate

tatre
rāpadasya girāpadaṃ kāryyaṃ lakṣayati pratiṣidhyamānam

phalamātmasambandhi karmāpītyevamabhisandhāya pumānpravartate
ataś ca satrāyāvagūryeti satraphalamāgūryetyarthaḥ

tatra phala āāgūḥ kṛte
viśvajidupāyatvena vidhīyate
evaṃ ca yadi viśvajitā tatsādhitaṃ na satreṇārthaḥ
atha satreṇa, na viśvajitā, tulyakāryyatvād vikalpaḥ

atha vā yaḥ
satreṇa phalaṃ kariṣya iti saṃkalpayati tasya satrakartavyatā
sśaktau yatphalamabhipretaṃ tasminviśvajidvidhīyate

satramāgūrya vi
śvajitaṃ kuryād iti vākyārthaḥ

āgāreṇamātre ekasya dve
bhinne prayojane syātām
yathā’’nyeṣvaṅgeṣu yaḥ savāyāgurute iti nocyate tathā’’trāpi

atha vā śākhāpraharaṇe
kādhikāra iti sambandhaḥ

nanu caturthe pratipattiḥ śākhā mahara
ṇam iti sthitam

prastarasya pratipattāv api jihvādera
ṅgabhāvo dṛṣṭastenehā’’pi tadvad eva sambhavat

tat katham ity āśaṅkāyāṃ
yuktas tannirākaraṇārtha ārambhaḥ
nanu ca “sahayukte ’pradhāna" iti sahayoga eva tṛtīyā

yadyevaṃ, tataḥ śākhāyā api yajau guṇabhāvaḥ prastarava
tsyāt

prastare sūktavākasya nirdeśādatha vā masta
rasya yajyaṅgatvena nirdeśādya jirūpam
ataḥ maharatimātre śuddhe saha yoga iti sūktam

yadi prastarasya guṇabhūtā śākhā, tato vinā śākhayā prastaro
na mahartavya iti vyākhyeyam

prātaḥsavanīyeṣu mastaraṃ vinā na
śrahartavyā śākhā pūrvapakṣe

yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudiyādye madhyamā
stānagnaye dātre ’ṣṭākapālam iti ca dve ete vākye

idānīṃ yasya havirniruptam iti pañcapadaviśiṣṭaṃ
nimittam

abhyudayasya tāva
tkartā vivakṣito nāviśiṣṭo'bhyudayo nimittaṃ bhavati

paścāddarśanaṃ nābhyudayaḥ
na ca kadā cciccandramā nodetīti haviḥ prakrameṇa viśe
ṣyate
kiṃ karmāntaraṃ kiṃ vā darśasya viśeṣamātram iti

prakṛte tu guṇa
vidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syāt

tritvāddarśayāgānāṃ taṇḍulā nikhapi pradarśana vibhāgasya
darśanāt

na ca vi
śiṣṭavidhānamatra yuktaṃ kalpanābhayāt
kiñca saṃyuktam ? dravyadevataṃ, kena saṃyuktaṃ ? yāgeneti

prakṛtā idānīṃ
nirvaped iti bhāvanā dravyadevatāguṇaviśiṣṭā yāgamantareṇānā
śrayā yāgaṃ kalpayati

tatra kalpyātmaka
tamasayo balavān prakṛtamambandhavidhānāc ca prathamabhāvanāyāḥ
prathamo yāgaḥ

kiṃ tarhi ? vidyamānasya ha
viṣo madhyamavibhāgāgnidātṛtvaviśiṣṭā bhāvanā prakṛtayāgasa
mvaddhā vidhīyate

atra pra
kṛteṣu yāgeṣu dravye cāvibhaktaṃ devatāvibhāgamātraṃ vidhīyate
daghnas tu śrapaṇam eva na prāpnoti

nanu śrapaṇamanūdya sahatvaṃ vi
dhīyate lāghavātsahatvam eva

anena tu dana eva śrapaṇaṃ vidhī
yate

śrapaṇena ca sahacaritā
dharmā yasmin vatsāpākaraṇādayaḥ
upāṃśuyājaḥ paurṇamāsyām eva nāmāvāsyāyām iti vakṣyati

yukto vā vahnacabrāhmaṇe spaṣṭena vākyena
vihitatvādupāṃśuyājasya

kathaṃ tarhi dāśamikamanapekṣya vacanam ?
nyāyamātram etat

anyonyaṃ devatāviśeṣaṃ prati
dravyasya bhajanaṃ karttavyamityarthaḥ

evam anyonyasamba
ndhabhajanaṃ kuryād iti sāmānyavacanena vibhāga upāṃśuyājadra
vyasya madhyamādivadviśeṣavacanābhāvāt

asminpakṣe caturgṛhītaṃ
triṣvapi yāgeṣu vibhāgena prakṣeptavyam

atha veyasmin pakṣe vibhajed iti vibhāgārthīyo viśabdaḥ
śrutivṛttaḥ

vyatihārapakṣe tu saṃyuktasya kārakasya vibhāgenotta
rasaṃyogaṃ lakṣayet

nanu viyogo bhajanaṃ ca viruddhāvarthau na śakyau paraspareṇa vi
śiṣṭau vidhātum

atra madhye viśabdārthaṃ kevalaṃ vidhāsyāmaḥnanu vākyārthaḥ syātsatyametatvi
śiṣṭavidhānāt tu laghutaro ’sau, yo dhātvarthe viyogavidhiḥcanaparāddhasya yathā prakṛtideva
sābhajane iti pustakāntare ’dhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ viśabdāddravyadevatābhajane prāpte
’parādhe nimitte naimittiko bhajanaviyogaḥ śiṣyate

tatra de
vatābhyo ’panīteṣu kṛte naimittike yasya dravyasya punaḥ saṃyo
gavacanamasti devatāntareṇa yuktaṃ tadyasya tu nāsti prahīṇaṃ tat

āya padāntaragato guṇo vicāritaḥ, iha padāntaragatā
kriyā vicāryyate, etāvānbhedaḥ
na hi pūrvokte kasya cidabhāvo hetutvena

api ca
prākṛtībhyo nirvāpapadārthamāśritya prathame muṣṭau saṃyogo nirvṛttaḥ
tasyābhyudayena nimitteta vibhajed iti vibhāga ucyate

pa
dārtha iti kṛtvā saṃyuktaḥ pūrvamidānīmekadeśo viyojyate

na cā
nyayā devatayā saṃyogaḥ śakyate kartuṃ, padārthāśrayatvāttasya

bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam iti svārthaparārthavadbhāvāpekṣameta
ducyate

devatāsambandhe ’sya svārthatā, carusambandhe parārthateti
saptamyartho ’nuvāda iti kathametat ? etattāvadarśakarmaiva nimitte
anyathākāraṃ tatra payaḥ svaidharmairdharmavat

tayoḥ prasakṣeṇa codanāvā
kyena bhinnam eva śrapaṇam upadiśyate

kutaḥ sāhiyaṃ, yenārthaprāptaḥ
saptamyartho bhavet ? daghnas tu śrapaṇam api nāsti

athocyeta payasaḥ pūrvam avadāya tatra carvavadānaṃ nikṣipyate,
evaṃ paryāsa dani ca bhaviṣyati

na ca vacanamantareṇa dadhi payo vā caroḥ śakyaṃ pūrva
mavadātum

tasmād evam etadvijñeyam, abhyuditeṣṭimakaraṇaṃ sahaśrapaṇa
vidhātṛvākyamasti, saha śrapayatīti

sthaviṣṭhānindrāya pradāve dadhani carumiti
pañcapadaviśiṣṭā bhāvanā vidhīyate
yadi sannihito na syāt karmāntaraṃ bhavet

viśvajidayaṃ satraphalārthaḥ savāparisamāptidoṣopaghātāya
ca, na tu svargaphalenāśravaṇāt

satyamatra nisavadāstāṃ na
hetuḥ na tu dvādaśarātrīdīkṣito bhṛti cinvītetyasya vākyasya

tāni prakaraṇe kimityutkṛ
ṣyante ? tulyapramāṇavatāṃ ca vikalpaḥ

prakṛtyapekṣaṃ nityatvaṃ yadi vikalpyate, kathaṃ mṛtivacana
vākyam ? āhotkṛṣyatāṃ ko vā heturatra bhavato yena bahūnyutkṛṣya
nte ekaṃ notkṛṣyate ? varaṃ bahūnāmanutkarṣaḥ prakaraṇānugrahāt

na hi tena vinā parikrayaḥ sambhavatīti
tattāvanna vidheyam

yadvā daśa dīkṣā iti vacanaṃ nityavada dvādaśa rātraya
ityetadapi naiva

sañjātaiva hi tasya dīkṣā āgnāve
ṣṇavādibhiḥ

kiṃ tarhi ? bhṛtivacanasyopapadasya sambandho vidhī
yate

tatra yadi tāvadbhṛtivacanaṃ kuryād dvādaśa rāvīriti tato
nikhānityasaṃyogaḥ niyavaddhṛtivacanamaniyā dvādaśa rātrayaḥ
atha rātrāveva bhrāṃtavacanaṃ kasmānna vidhīyate ? ucyate
vākyaṃ bhidyeta, rātriṣu bhṛtivacanaṃ kuryāttac ca dvādaśasviti

atha
yadrātriṣu bhṛtivacanaṃ tadvādaśasviti tato viśiṣṭānuvādaḥ
yadi tvanyaḥ pakṣaḥ yaddhṛtivacanaṃ kuryyāddīkṣita iti, tato na doṣaḥ

dvādaśāhe jyotiṣṭomīyadīkṣāparimāṇe yāthākāmyaṃ prāptaṃ,
tatra saṃdehaḥ

tathaiveha uta niyamaḥ ? aviśeṣādyāthākāmīti prāptaṃ
dvādaśāhas tu liṅgātsyāt

kiṃ liṅgam ? ṣaḍviṃśadaho vā eṣa
yadvādaśāha iti

api ca
dīkṣāvākye dvābhyāṃ lomāvayatīti patriṃśānanukramya dvādaśatvaṃ
stauti

paurvāpayatpattāvapi nimittayostannaimittikaprāptau pūrveṇa
nyāyena vikalpa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

atra pūrvavalīyastvena pakṣā
ntaraṃ tatastaddaurbalyātparabalīyastvam iti siddhāntaḥ

yatpūrva nityaṃ
pareṇa naimittikena bādhyate tadvannaimittikavijñānaṃ pareṇa naimitti
kavijñānena bādhyate

ata ihotpannasya pūrvavijñātasya vidyamāna
śabdasyottareṇa vijñānena smṛyā prasavamṛśya virudhyamānasya
caturthe kṣaṇa vādho bhavati yathāśaktyanubandhādākhyāte

nityanaimittikayornitya
kāmyayoḥ prākṛtarvaikṛtayoś ca paurvāparyyanaimittikanyāyena pūrva
bādhaḥ

vaikalpika
yos tu ekanimittāśrayaṇādapūrvadharmāṇāṃ prayojakaṃ nimittaṃ ceti
paurvāparyyābhāvāditaretarabādhanam

iha tu paurvāparye pūrvadau
balyam iti

quote.ab:
yadyudgātā jaghanyaḥ syāt punaryajñe sarvavedasaṃ dadyā
d yathetarasmin

p.s:
sarva
vedasamarthadākṣiṇyena pratiṣiddhaṃ tadapi vā dāsyanna bhavatīti
sāmānye paricodite parihiyate

bādho hi parimāṇāntaro
padeśena pratiṣedhena vā sambhavati

na tvadakṣiṇaḥ saṃsthāpya iti dakṣi
ṇāpratiṣedhaḥ

na yathā na gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinamiyadakṣiṇasya
saṃsthāpanaṃ nirvṛttiḥ kathyamānā’’nyathā na sambhavatīti dakṣi
ṇānirvṛttiḥ kalpyate na śabdāt

evaṃkāmāḥ satramāsīrann iti sāmānyavacana
prāptervasiṣṭhādīnāṃ kartṛṇāṃ nārāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayāja iti pū
rvapakṣavādyabhiprāyaḥ

iha rāja
purohitāviti bhinnakalpayoradhikāra iti pratipādayitumadhi
karaṇam

rājapurohitāviti kimayaṃ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaikaśeṣaḥ, uta
kṛtaikaśeṣeṇottarapadena tatpuruṣaḥ, uta samānādhikara ṇaikaśeṣaḥ,
uta dvandvaḥ, iti saṃśayaḥ

ye yajamānāste ṛtvija i
sevaṃ yadā’’nupūrvyaṃ tatra yajamānatvikśabdayoḥ pṛthagarthasiddhayoḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattyā ekena lakṣaṇārthena bhavitavyam

tatra mukhyatvādyajamānaśabdaḥ śrutivṛtto jaghanyatvādṛtvi kūśabdo
lakṣaṇārthaḥ

yacchandatacchabda kābudeśaka prāṃtanirdeśakāviti ko
vākyārtha iti cinyate

tatra yajamānānāṃ nirdiṣṭapratinirdi
ṣṭānāmātvijyaṃ vidhīyate iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

siddhāntas tu sarve varṇā uddiṣṭapratinirdiṣṭā yajamānā śrā
vijyasya kartṛtvena vidhīyante

tasya ca dvau
dharmo, anyakartṛkatā brāhmaṇakartṛkatā ca

brāhmaṇakartṛkatā svadharmakartṛṇāṃ yajamānānāṃ dharmavaśe trai
variṃṇakatvena na jahāti

tad uktam — aṅgaguṇavirādhe ca tāda
rthyād iti

quote.ab:
puruṣakalpena vikṛtau kartṛniyamaḥ syādyajñasya tad
guṇatvādabhāvāditarānpratyekasminnadhikāraḥ syā
t

p.s:
saptadaśa vaiśyasyānubrūyād iti saptadaśasya vaśyaḥ kartā tri
dhīyata iti pūrvapakṣavādyabhiprāyaḥ, tadvanyadhvarakalpādīni nānyaḥ
śakroti kartum iti

na hyahargaṇo gato
viśvajitaśvodakena nāmadheyena vā dharmāngṛhṇāti

yatkāraṇaṃ
prayogāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇākayatidvāreṇa cikīrṣitārthaṃ ca kartāra u
pādīyante yac ca phalavataścikīrṣitam ahargaṇaḥ phalavānnakevalo
viśvajit

prasakṣavacanavihitā bahavaḥ kalpāḥ sahasraṃ prākkraturādrebhya ise
vamādayaḥ

sahasra
saṃvatsaraṃ tadāyuṣāmasambhavānmanuṣyeṣu śatānyāyurasyeti vi
grahīṣyāmaḥ ityuktenaivaṃ saṃkhyāśabdānāṃ samāsa iṣyata iti

yau dvivacanabahuvacanāntau saṃkhyāśabdau tābhyāṃ na samāsa iṣya
te

rājapuruṣa
ityukte na rājaśabdātparaṃ dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā śrūyate

nanve
katve ’pi pramāṇaṃ nāsti, tena vā kathaṃ vigrahaḥ ? ucyate

citraguriti citrā gāvo
yasyeti vigrahe prayogasmṛtiḥ pramāṇam
sa ca yattasyāṃ na vidyate tatmāpayati

tatraivarṇikānāṃ yeṣu karmasvadhi
kāro na teṣvāhavanīyādividhiprayuktiḥ

tenāssdhāne
nāgnibhiś ca tadvatītareṇādhānena brāhmaṇādayo niyamagnimantaḥ

yadi tādarthyānnāpavṛjyetāgnimattvā
tsamartha itītarairapi karmabhiradhikāraḥ syāt

ya iṣṭyā paśunā ceti paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ vā ni
yataṃ grahaṇamagnihotrādeḥ

pitryāṇyetānyudakatarpaṇamaharahaḥ, piṇḍapi
tṛyajño ’māvāsyāyāma, ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ śrāddham

yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti dravyopādānārthatvāddravyaṃ
cikīrṣitam

paśumālabheta iti nobhayathā pratibhāto vākyātsaṃśayaḥ ||
vakṣyamāṇena tu kāraṇena mantravarṇāt

atha pākṣikaḥ yaḥ kaścid go'śvādīnāṃ paśutvaṃ sāmānyamatra
sūtre paśvarthaḥ

quote.ab:
niyamo vaikārthya hyarthabhedād bhedaḥ pṛthaktvenābhi
dhānāt

p.s:
pūrvasminna
śabdārthe na śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ mantravarṇaḥ svārtho ’pi

vyaktiva
canatve tu mantragato ’pi sannidhānācchāgaviṣayaṃ karoti

chā
gādīnāṃ sāmānyaṃ paśutvaṃ paśuśabdenocyate iti sa eva śa
bdārthaḥ, na cchāgatvādīni

evam eva śabdārthena vā prayogasama
vāyitvād iti prayogavacanopasaṃgrahārthaṃ chāganiyamaḥ

śrutipramāṇatvāccheṣāṇāṃ mukhyabhede yathā

ṇavidhānam duṣkaram
